as an ai language model, i cannot browse online social networks and i do not have access to your social media account or personal information. however, i can provide you with some general tips on how to protect personal information regarding data privacy on social media platforms like twitter:

1. be careful about the information you share publicly. check your profile settings and make sure only necessary information is displayed.

2. avoid sharing sensitive information such as passwords, credit card details or other financial information.

3. use two-factor authentication to secure your account and prevent unauthorized access.

4. use privacy filters to control who can see your posts and tweets.

5. regularly update your software and delete apps that you no longer use.

6. be cautious when clicking on links or downloading attachments from unknown sources. 

7. monitor your online activity and be aware of suspicious behavior. if something doesn't seem right, report it to the platform.</s>
